title: Brig. Mohammad Ahmed PMâ€™s new military secretary
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 15 (APP):Brigadier Mohammad Ahmed has assumed the charge of new Military Secretary to Prime Minister Imran Khan, the PM Office said on Wednesday.
The outgoing Military Secretary Brigadier Waseem Iftikhar Cheema paid a
farewell call on the Prime Minister this afternoon.
During the call, the Prime Minister appreciated the services of outgoing
Military Secretary and wished him success in his professional career,
the PM Office said.
